title: Ivan Yaaro Lyrics Minnale
stanzas:
Ivan Yaaro Â Lyrics #Minnale
#HarrishJayaraj #Thamarai #Unnikrishnan #Harini

Verenna Verenna Vendum
orumurai sonnaal podhum
nilavayum undha
kaal midhiyaai vaipene

Sollavum kooda vendaam
kannimaithaale podhum
kelvigal indri
uyirayum naan tharuvene

oh ....
oh mounam mounam
mounam mounam yaen
verenna vendum vendum
seigiren seigiren.

Ivan yaaro Ivan yaaro
vandhadhu edharkkaaga
sirikindraan rasikindraan
enakke enakkaaga

ennaachu enake
theriyavillai
enmoochin kaaichal
kuraiyavillai

ada enna idhu
enna idhu ippadi
maattik kondaen

idhu pudikkiradha
pudikkalayaa yaaridam
kaettu sollven.
Ivan yaaro ..

Thottathil ulla
thottathil ulla
pookkal ellaame
vanna pookkal ellaame.

thalayai thiruppi
paarkkumaanaal
alaithadhu unaithaane
naano alaithadhu
unaithaane.

nenje nenje unnai
ullae vaithadhu yaaru

nee varum paadhi
engum, en iru
ullangai thaangum ..
Ivan yaaro..

Kaalgalin koluse
kaalgalin koluse
kobam varugiradhe
unmel kobam varugiradhe

naan andha idhathil
sinungida thudithaen
nee vandhu keduthaye
paavi nee vandhu keduthaaye

yaeno yaeno ennai
paarka seithaai unnai

naan unnai kaanathaanaa
ugamthorum
kaaththukidanthaenaa..

Ivan yaaro Ivan yaaro
vandhadhu edharkkaaga
sirikindraan rasikindraan
hmm mmm hmm mmm.

naanthaane naanthaane
vandhen unakkaaga
sirikindren
rasikindren
unakke unakkaaga.

ennachu enakke
theriyalaye
enmoochin kaaichal
kuraiyalaye

ada enna idhu
enna idhu ennidam
pesi vidu

ennai pudichirukkaa
pudikkalayaa
oru murai solli vidu
orey oru murai solli vidu
solli vidu
solli vidu
solli vidu ..

seo.title: Ivan Yaaro Lyrics Minnale
seo.description: Get the complete Ivan Yaaro Lyrics Minnale from Minnale. Read the lyrics penned by Thamarai and composed by Harrish Jeyaraj and sung by Harini. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Thamarai, Minnale, Harrish Jeyaraj, Harini, Unnikrishnan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
